phrases: Today is my first day of high school.
His job is to take care of his whole class.
It is too bad he is so serious that he cannot get a girlfriend.
We are in the same class again.
Th-Thanks for taking care of my brother.
Do you have more girl friends?
Stop it, Hotaru, that is rude.
The hell are you talking about?
Sorry, she is really attached to me.
And what are you to my brother?
I am sure I am wrong, but to be really sure, you two are not dating, are you?
I confessed to him, but he has not given me an answer yet.
You will hurt her if you lead her on.
Reject me if you have to.
It is not that I do not like you.
Cannot you tell I am worried for you?
She is just toying with you.
You will only get hurt if you go out with her.
I am not thinking of dating her or anything.
You do not need a girlfriend, right?
Sorry, Minagawa-san, I cannot go out with you without thinking it through.
I mean, if we did, we would have to think about marriage,
You have been that serious about me?
N-No, that is not what I meant.
That is why I like him.
Maybe I will give you some more time.
You will be rooting for me, right, Hotaru-chan?
I will adore both of you together.
There is not really anything that I am drawn to.
I have no interests or hobbies that keep me engaged.
I know that I am a boring person.
But is anyone really interested by what they say they are?
You look like you would like stars and stuff.
Want To join the astronomy club?
Come on, at least hear me out.
Have you chosen a club yet?
Then want to join me in watching an orchestra of stars?
Is it any fun watching the stars?
Do not you get bored just watching them?
Is there anything else interesting about it?
So far, 100 of its members have hooked up.
You do not really like stars that much, do you, Senpai?
So why are you in the astronomy club?
Well, y'know, I like the vibe of it!
How many other members are there?
You are not interested in any other clubs, right?
Let me tell you a story that will make you like stars, then.
There is a star called Spica somewhere around there.
It looks like one big star,
but it is actually two stars spinning around and pulling each other.
Two stars help each other and become one big light.
Is that all you have got?
I feel like he taught me all kinds of stuff...
I had delicious takoyaki while watching Mars.
My senpai, who just graduated, was, like,
Martians look like octopus, do not they?
So I made takoyaki as we watched Mars.
But Senpai stared at Mars the whole time,
so I scarfed them all down by myself.
This is not even about stars anymore.
She must really love the astronomy club.
I wish I could be absorbed by something, the way she is.
I am sure you will enjoy it!
There is not really anything that I am drawn to.
I was sick of being such a boring person,
so I would been looking for something to like.
Is this what I have been looking for?
But I felt the need to see more of this smile.
Kamine, are not you going home?
She will not even look at me.
I just lost a contact lens.
I will take care not to step on it.
I want you to help me look for it!
I guess she does not really hate me.
Do you lose your contacts often?
Like when I wipe away my sweat.
Kamine, is there something that you want to tell me?
I intend to answer to your wishes to the best of my ability.
So you can tell me anything.
I am not sure what you might mean.
Remember how you lent me your notebook
when I was having a hard time seeing in class because of my eyesight?
I mean, you are so kind.
I guess that was uncalled for.
No, you do not need to apologize.
If I can at least find it for you...
I just wanted to tell you how I feel.
Are you asking me to own up?
I just want to know how you feel.
All right, if that will make you feel better.
Honestly, it is not easy for me to understand how girls feel.
I will surely because you more trouble if I were to be near you.
If you will accept me nonetheless, then please.
Does that mean you will go out with me?
Of course, that was implied by what I just said.
I still have not confessed properly, have I?
If there is something you want to tell me, go ahead.
It was not supposed to rain.
I have never really talked to him before.
I felt bad, so we walked home together part way.
It must be embarrassing, walking home with a girl.
I guess he means no one would suspect anything if it is just me.
A-Are not you embarrassed doing this with a guy?
B-But I mean, what if your crush saw you or something?
I do not really have one.
I do not know much about dating.
What if someone confessed to you, then?
What if someone confessed to you?
I think I would turn them down.
There has to be something wrong with anyone who would confess to me.
You are always helping people clean,
and you take care of the pupfish.
I am taking the bus here.
Were not you about to say something?
I do not think I can.
I am sure he is popular.
I was about to say something.
I figured I would finish saying it.
You are trying to cheer me up, right?
Maybe I will bake him cookies as thanks for the umbrella.
